sentences.english: What makes me uncomfortable is that this after he has endured so much, the country has at last harmed him.

sentences.english: All the days before tomorrow, I will love you, to endure silently.
sentences.chinese: 明天之前的每一天，我都会隐忍地爱着你。

sentences.english: Most of the persons aboard are under hidden tears while doing their work.
sentences.chinese: 船上很多人在工作时默默隐忍着泪水。

sentences.english: Tolerance desolation under the breaking out of a two three chapters.
sentences.chinese: 隐忍下的苍凉开出一朵两朵三朵断章。

sentences.english: His first wife spent twenty years enduring and forgiving his infidelities .

sentences.english: Have a kind of eternity is actually contain a kind of strength.
sentences.chinese: 有一种隐忍其实是蕴藏着的一种力气。

sentences.english: Did not think of two people bear long already amour to erupt immediately, instantly lightning marriage.
sentences.chinese: 没想到两人隐忍已久的恋情顿时爆发，立即闪电结婚。

sentences.english: To my mind, as long as I could get married with jack, I did not care whether he had had some love affairs with other women.
sentences.chinese: 只要能和安杰结婚，他的艳遇，我可以隐忍。
